name: Nomad Defense
description:
clicky shooty defendy

for demoday 2, the game now has:

usable rope lifts

a ballista

hud functions for climbing and changing formation

for demoday 3, enjoy the beginnings of an overworld and some rudimentary construction

in the latest release, all terrain generation problems should now be fixed

for demoday 4, the construction system is greatly expanded.
